channel.title: 508 help
channel.description: i really need help with my mezzy-scape 508 v3.5: problem1:i cant make myself owner on it i changed it in the login.java but when i tr to trade a normal player it say's "administrators cannot trade normal players" i do want that rule but not to apply on me :| :P.....help problem2:when i first got the base and client i logged on and used bank and the title says "i like to leech"!! .....help :(

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

[quote=“Sir Jay, post:2, topic:374661”]…Look around for the sendmessage statement administrators cannot trade normal players and add something along the lines of if (rights > 1) { //cannottrade; } else if (equals("name")) { //cantrade; }
Obviously mine is just a type up and yours will be different.

Again, look for the sendmessage statement i like to leech under a method where banking is…[/quote]
thankss

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

i really need help with my mezzy-scape 508 v3.5:
problem1:i cant make myself owner on it i changed it in the login.java but when i tr to trade a normal player it say’s “administrators cannot trade normal players” i do want that rule but not to apply on me :P…help
problem2:when i first got the base and client i logged on and used bank and the title says “i like to leech”!! …help
